name: Hezus - Journey's End In Lovers Meeting 7"
description: LISTEN HERE WATCH VIDEO HERE MORE PICS OF THE PACKAGE HEZUS is a wife & husband duo from San Diego, CA: Ian (Drums/Vox/Guitar/Bass/ Sounds) and Doreen de Cerbo (Keys/Vox/Perc/Sounds). "JOURNEY'S END IN LOVERS MEETING" / "COVERED" is HEZUS' first vinyl release. It features DRB from San Diego's DIRTY DRUMS collective. It's limited to 300 copies: all of them sold on beautiful silkscreened arigatos by Superheights: 100 black, 100 red and 100 electric blue, all hand-numbered. Plus you got color insert with liner notes and sticker inside. Vinyls are pressed by URPressing in Nashville, TEN. (Third Man, Daptone, Trouble In Mind...). If you have a favorite arigato color, mention it on your paypal bill. First come first serve. NOTE: Bigcartel shipment calculator seem to ask for ridiculous prices. Don't hesitate to pass your order and i'll double check and payback each order concerned. Here's the real deal: Shipments prices: France: 1 copy: 3€ - 2/3 copies: 5€ Europe: 1 copy: 4,50€ - 2/3 copies: 6€ Rest of the world: 1 copy: 6€ - 2/3 copies: 8€

name: Odd Nosdam - Ten Echoes (Vinyl Postcard, Lim. 50)
description:
We're extremely proud to launch our new serie of vinyl postcards with Odd Nosdam from Anticon / cLOUDDEAD fame. This one features an unreleased track of his, called Ten Echoes.

Your postcard, designed by Rimrimrim and hand-numbered from 1 to 50 (no repress!) comes with an original STA enveloppe and stickers.

Preorders start on Monday 28th, orders ship around June 5/7th.
1 copy max per customer.

name: Olsun x Rimrimrim - Time Is Now VHS
description: VIDEO PREVIEW HERE Time Is Now is an audio & video project by STA curators Olsun & Rimrimrim. While Olsun offers a 30 minutes mix of dark & melancholic 60es psych gems, Rimrimrim, the artist behind all Psychcast visuals, adds a visual montage of giallos and other obscure sources inspired by Olsun's mix. This right here is the VHS version released by US label Video/Horror/Show, featuring more Rimrimrim visuals, insert with full tracklist and stickers.

name: Doc Delay - REM Sleep II (Limited CD / Arigato ed.)
description: LISTEN HERE VIDEO PREVIEW HERE Doc Delay is a DJ from Brooklyn, works for Good Records NYC and is responsible for incredible mix-cds such as Psycrunk, Eastern Block Party, Medium Rare, Rajaz Meter, or, well, the first REM Sleep opus. REM SLEEP II is a blend of rare gems mixed with great savoir faire. So, this is not just a uber-selective mix for psych nerds.. Well it is too, but not only... Everything is done with great coherence for the listener's pleasure. It's sold as a limited edition cd (300 copies only!), silkscreened arigato pak by Superheights, plus you got an insert with full tracklisting and a STA sticker.

name: Skull Slate Shirt
description: CHECK OUT THE PROMO VIDEO HERE SOLD OUT Back with some more freshness! To complement our recent first release we decided to make the very first Six Ton Armor shirts. Two colors: Asphalt (dark grey with electric blue logo) and Slate (clear grey with black logo). Rimrimrim not only did the cool visuals but he added lovely skull prints and some nice handmade labels for each one! Our good friend Sev from Superheights did the silkscreen so you know it's quality. All shirts are American Apparel.... Only a handful on each size and each color so be quick! Once it's gone, it's gone for good. Please mention your size in the check-out notes when you pass your order.
